pr_title: Added JUnit tests for Commons package

timeline.bodyText:
assertEquals has an overload method that accepts a message as a first argument. So fail invoked in the catch exception is not the correct usage of Assert stuff.
Please change this and also other similar usages.
timeline.author: Coduz

timeline.bodyText:
If they are not intended to match please use assertNotEquals.
If KapuaFileUtils.getAsURL(...) is meant to throw an Exception catch the Exception and do asserts on the type of Exception expected.
timeline.author: Coduz

timeline.message:
Added JUnit tests for Commons package

Signed-off-by: code-incubus <nemanja.milutinovic@comtrade.com>

timeline.bodyText: Which is the issue with this method?
timeline.author: Coduz

replies.bodyText:
@Coduz
That’s the comment I found in that class. So if that method ever changes or whatever ... it is necessary to adjust the test. That's all.
replies.author: code-incubus
